availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Turner B. Hungate (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Hungate and Margaret Bottom Hungate. Married to Harriet F. Hungate. Father of Margeret E. Hungate, Mary J. Hungate, and James B. Hungate. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Farmer in Mercer County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 325A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 573.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Indiana, Johnson County, Clark Township, p. 10D.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Mercer County, KY, August 1863, p. 14.
"Turner Bottom Hungate (1827-1914)," Find A Grave, Memorial 84345821, accessed July 13, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84345821.
